Entries.NPC.cs.4448: Did you finish the adoption papers?$h#$b#I hope no one comes asking who your partner is...$8
Entries.NPC.cs.4440: Did you finish the adoption papers?$h#$b#I hope no one comes asking who your partner is...$8
Entries.NPC.cs.4441: Did you finish the adoption papers?$h#$b#I hope no one comes asking who your partner is...$8

Entries.BirthMessage_PlayerMother: During the night, your new baby was dropped off.

Entries.NPC.cs.4448: I can't believe we're going to have a child soon, @!$u#$b#What are even the logistics of this happening?$l
Entries.NPC.cs.4440: I can't believe we're going to have a child soon, @!$u#$b#What are even the logistics of this happening?$l
Entries.NPC.cs.4441: I can't believe we're going to have a child soon, @!$u#$b#What are even the logistics of this happening?$l

Entries.HaveBabyQuestion: Wouldn't it be amazing if we had a child, @...?
Entries.BirthMessage_PlayerMother: During the night, your new baby arrived.

Entries.patio_SenS: Oh, hello @!$h#$b#It's such a lovely day out, isn't it?$l#$e#Hm?#$b#Don't worry, I won't stay out in the sun for too long.$h
Entries.spouseRoom_SenS: Ahh, there's nothing like a good book in the morning, is there?$l#$b#You're welcome to take a gander at anything on my shelf.$h#$e#I'm sure there must be something there that you'd be interested in!$h
Entries.spring_SenS: Ahh.. the spring. There was nothing quite like it down in the mines.$h#$b#The fresh air, the lush grass you can just sink into...$l#$e#Oh, and the plethora of bugs!$7
Entries.spring_8: I read that the wings of butterflies are very, very fragile.#$b#You should never, ever touch them because the oils on your hands can damage them.$s#$e#I don't know if my little claws would hurt a butterfly, but it's best leave them be.$h
Entries.spring_12: Oh dear, the egg festival is tomorrow.#$b#I better go iron out my costume...$s#$e#Goodness, I can't stand wearing that thing!$8
Entries.spring_13: Are we going to go to the egg festival today?#$b#I'm avoiding putting on that Yoba forsaken costume until you say you're ready to go.$8
Entries.spring_20: I really need to get some new sewing needles.#$b#The Flower Dance is just a couple days away and my costume is in dire need of repair!$u#$e#Wait, do we happen to have any around the house!$h
Entries.spring_23: Tomorrow is the Flower Dance...#$b#Perhaps I will actually try to dance tomorrow?$8#$e#No, no. Not a chance!$u#$b#I have two left feet.$8
Entries.spring_24: Today's the flower dance, @.#$b#Have you thought of someone to dance with?$h#$e#I'm sure anyone you ask would say yes!$h#$b#You are an amazing fellow!$h
Entries.spring_28: When I first came to the surface, I was very scared.$s#$b#I didn't know where to go, the sun was bright and I got lost immediately.$s#$e#Thankfully, that night, Krobus found me before anyone else did.#$b#He helped me find a safe place to stay. I'm very, very grateful for him.$8
Entries.summer_SenS: Goodness gracious, the summer is so brutal.$s#$b#While I was perusing my atlas, I read about the Calico Desert. Apparently it's even hotter there.#$e#My first thought was "No thank you, I never want to go there!".$u
Entries.summer_10: Time to get out the sand castle costume for tomorrow.$12#$b#Fun fact, it's still full of sand from last year.$8
Entries.summer_11: I'm getting my sand castle disguise ready...$h#$b#Remember not to draw too much attention to me!$8#$e#I will be buried in the sand, so I'd be at the mercy of anyone who lifts the cloth!$u
Entries.summer_15: Hmmm. I'm a bit stumped on what to read. Could you give me some recommendations?#$b#$y'What will you recommend?_The non-fiction book: {{Random:A Guidebook to++The Encyclopedia of++The Lost Files of ++A History of|inputSeparator=++}} {{Random:Motherhood++Computer Science++Snails++World Hunger++Llamas|inputSeparator=++}}_Hmm... Sounds interesting! I'm always dying to know more about the surface world.$h_The romance novel: {{Random:Lost++Beloved++Strange++Fickle++Tsundere++I Love My|inputSeparator=++}} {{Random:City++Dudes++Mistress++Monster++Lone Wolf++Trashcan|inputSeparator=++}}_ Y-you want me to read a romance novel? Romantic love is a rather foreign concept to me, but I'll give it a try.$l_The fan-fiction: {{Random:Sonic++Shane++Lewis++Linus++M. Jasper++Sebastian++M. Rasmodius++Pam++Dobson|inputSeparator=++}} and the {{Random:Secret Romance++Grand Adventure++Dwarf King++Untold Secret++Mystery of Life|inputSeparator=++}}_...You want me to read what?$6
Entries.summer_27: Hey @, have you seen my jelly costume?$8#$b#If I don't find it by tomorrow evening, I won't be able to get a good spot to see the moonlight jellies!$u
Entries.summer_28: Whew, I sure am glad I found my costume.$h#$b#I thought for sure I was gonna miss out on seeing those cute little jellyfish this year!$8
Entries.fall_SenS: Fall... This season is so, so beautiful.$l#$b#The colors are so vibrant, like nothing I've ever in the mines.$l#$e#The sun is less intense, and the air is cool, but not freezing.$l#$b#I'll probably be able to go outside more often!$h#$b#Granted wear my cloak, of course.$h
Entries.fall_15: Oh, the fair is in town tomorrow! Can you sneak me in to play some of the games?$7#$e#I'll be in a pumpkin suit, so you can say I'm one of your human "nephews" or something like that.$12
Entries.fall_16: Remember, we've got a deal! You sneak me into some of those games today, and I'll...$h#$b#I'll...$h#$b#Hm...$8#$b#I'll give you the best treasure I find in the post-event trash tonight!$12
Entries.fall_23: ... Two words: %adj %noun.#$b#Need I say anything more?{{Random:$s++$l++$u++$a++$h|inputSeparator=++}}#$e#Sorry, I'd rather not explain further.
Entries.fall_26: Sooo, @... Do you have enough candy prepared for Spirits Eve tomorrow?#$b#$y 'Do ya?_Definitely!_Well I wouldn't be so sure. I maaaay have ate it all before you woke up.$8_Nope._You noticed I got into it last night, didn't you?$8'
Entries.fall_27: I won't be going to Spirits Eve in any costume, so don't give me away, okay?$h#$b#Just tell everybody my costume is really convincing.$12
Entries.winter_SenS: You'd think I'd like the winter because it was cool and wet, but you'd be very wrong.#$b#It's so bright from the snow during the day.$a#$e#I'm not sure which would fry me worse, the light reflecting off the snow or the summer sun.$8#$b#At least the sun starts setting earlier in the winter. That's more time I can be outside.$h
Entries.winter_20: Tonight I'm going to head down into the sewers to visit with Krobus.#$b#We like to sit around and share cave snacks.$h#$e#Tonight it's going to be {{Random:teriyaki++barbecue++sweet and sour++buttery|inputSeparator=++}} {{Random:bug steak++slimeballs++ghost fish++strange bun++snails|inputSeparator=++}}$7!
Entries.winter_24: The Feast of the Winter Star is tomorrow, yeah?#$b#I won't be joining in the public festivities, but I'll be enjoying the cozy atmosphere from afar.$h
Entries.winter_25: I was feeling a bit down that I can't participate in today's festivities, so here's a little gift for you.$l[268 454 417]#$e#That was real hard to get my claws on. I hope you enjoy it, @!$h
Entries.winter_28: So that's it, huh? It's the last day of another year.#$b#It feels like just yesterday I came to the surface...$u#$e#Things change so fast, don't they, @?$h#$b#Here's to another year of friendship between us!$l

Entries.Utility.cs.5370: Well, let's get right to it!
Entries.GiftReaction_Void_Ghost_Pendant: Oh @, you're such a silly goose.$8#$b#We're already living together![808]$h
Entries.GiftReaction_Void_Ghost_Pendant_Birthday: Oh @, you're such a goofball...$l#$b#I suppose this means you most certainly don't want me to go anywhere, huh?$12#$b#I can't think of a happier sentiment to receive on my birthday!$h
Entries.GiftReaction_Pumpkin: Ooooh, a pumpkin! Thank you, @!$7#$b#I'm gonna set this up in with a cute little face!$h
Entries.GiftReaction_Bug_Steak: Mmm... Fresh, juicy, squishy...$l#$b#Thanks for the snack, @!$h
